overview: Collection of three short films from Falcon Studios and Bob Anthony Studio. "Winner's Way" — Teams up sex-starved Tom Cline with a hot stud who comes equipped with a set of toys and a couple of greased fists.  "Acrobatic Fuckmates" (a.k.a. "Fuck Mates") — Where horny Dirk keeps things in the family as he fucks his wife's big brother.  "Chaparral" — Where the great outdoors is the perfect backdrop for a young country boy feelin' his oats… and ready to do some wild and foolish things.
title: Winner's Way
